name: Tomato Egg Stir Fry
steps: Heat oil, add garlic and onion. Add beaten eggs. Add tomatoes and salt. Cook 5-7 minutes until eggs are cooked through.

name: Simple Veg Fried Rice
steps: Stir fry veggies in hot oil with garlic. Add cooked rice, soy sauce, and salt. Mix well for 3-4 minutes.

name: Masala Maggi
steps: Cook maggi with water and masala as per packet. In another pan, sauté onion and tomato. Mix with maggi.

name: Paneer Tikka
steps: Marinate paneer in yogurt mixture for 30 mins. Grill or pan-fry until golden. Serve with mint chutney.

name: Chicken Biryani
steps: Layer marinated chicken with partially cooked rice. Seal and cook on high heat for 5 mins, then low heat for 45 mins.

name: Chole Bhature
steps: Prepare batter from flour and yogurt. Deep fry until fluffy. Cook soaked chickpeas with onion, tomato and spices.

name: Butter Chicken
steps: Cook chicken in tandoori spices. Prepare sauce with butter, cream, and tomato puree. Mix chicken with sauce.

name: Margherita Pizza
steps: Prepare dough with flour and yeast. Spread tomato sauce, add mozzarella and basil. Bake at 450F for 15 minutes.

name: Pasta Carbonara
steps: Cook pasta. Fry bacon until crispy. Mix eggs with parmesan. Toss hot pasta with bacon, then add egg mixture.

name: Dal Makhani
steps: Slow cook lentils and beans. Prepare cream sauce with butter, tomato, and spices. Mix and simmer for 15 mins.

name: Aloo Gobi
steps: Cube potatoes and cauliflower. Fry separately until golden. Combine with onion-tomato base and spices. Cook 10 mins.

name: Shrimp Scampi
steps: Sauté garlic in olive oil and butter. Add shrimp and cook 2-3 mins each side. Deglaze with wine and lemon juice.

name: Greek Salad
steps: Chop tomatoes, cucumbers and olives. Add crumbled feta. Dress with olive oil, lemon juice and oregano.

name: Fish Curry
steps: Fry onions with ginger-garlic. Add turmeric and chili. Add fish and coconut milk. Simmer 15 minutes.

name: Vegetable Hakka Noodles
steps: Boil noodles. Stir-fry chopped vegetables with garlic-ginger. Add noodles and soy sauce. Toss well.

name: Tandoori Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt-spice mix for 4 hours. Grill until cooked through and charred.

name: Samosas
steps: Prepare dough. Make spiced potato-pea filling. Wrap in triangles. Deep fry until golden.

name: Ramen Bowl
steps: Simmer broth. Cook noodles. Prepare toppings with soft-boiled egg and pork. Assemble and serve hot.

name: Caprese Sandwich
steps: Slice bread and layer with mozzarella, tomato, and basil. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.

name: Biryani Rice
steps: Parboil rice. Layer with fried onions and spiced yogurt. Cook covered until rice is tender.

name: Tom Yum Soup
steps: Simmer lemongrass and galangal in broth. Add shrimp and mushrooms. Season with lime and fish sauce.

name: Pad Thai
steps: Stir-fry noodles with shrimp and egg. Add sauce ingredients and toss. Top with peanuts and sprouts.

name: Risotto
steps: Toast rice. Add warm broth gradually while stirring. Add wine and parmesan. Cook until creamy.

name: Biryani Vegetables
steps: Layer parboiled rice with vegetables cooked in yogurt-spice mixture. Cook covered until flavors meld.

name: Chow Mein
steps: Cook and crisp noodles. Stir-fry vegetables and egg. Mix with noodles and soy sauce.

name: Mushroom Risotto
steps: Sauté mushrooms separately. Toast rice and gradually add warm broth. Finish with parmesan and mushrooms.

name: Lentil Soup
steps: Sauté aromatic vegetables. Add lentils and broth. Simmer 30 minutes until lentils are tender.
